item.title: SOLID
item.description: Well Codeignition has added some new faces recently, and yeah I am one of them. I just passed out from IIT Jodhpur and got in here. And its been a huge learning experience since. Writing code is not the same now. Now I need to impose a great deal of thought on the structure of the code, and yes, SOLID has been a big help. So let’s get back to the basics and see what the fuss it is.
